name: Candy Sushi for Kids
author: ilovemybffz11
summary: Candy sushi is perfect for kids' birthdays or an April Fool's day joke. It is the most yummy thing I've ever made beside my orange Creamsicle® pie. And its very simple, so even my 6-year-old can make it! If you want to be more creative, spread frosting and sprinkles on the top of the circle under the Swedish Fish®!
ingredients: 8  crispy marshmallow bars (such as Rice Krispies®)
2 rolls green fruit leather snack (such as Fruit by the Foot®)
1 (2 ounce) package gummy fish candy (such as Swedish Fish®)
directions: Cut each crispy rice bar into a circle
Wrap a piece of green fruit leather along the edge of each circle, sushi-roll style
Top each "sushi roll" with 1 or 2 gummy fish candies
